title: (x) Teatro Camï¿½es - Reykjavik 1 {Yves}
content:
Hello there,   
   
A beautiful font to ID. I recognize this C from somewhere....   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20705.jpg)
author: adriano

comments.content:
.. shame on me ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) yes, that's the one. I even went to the PSYOPS site yesterday...   
   
Another thing Yves, there was once a link to a font/foundry that wasn't available for sale (I think the authors are on these foruns too). Can't find the link on my bookmarks... The name of the font is "something" sans ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) There was even a topic where someone refered to it as NOT AGAIN. It had a simmilar vibe as this Reykjavik.

No. I recall some green elemntes on a modern homepage for that font sample. Also recal they had something like 14 samples and the font I want was one of the last (11/12?). My memory holes are strange I know.   
   
The topic on typophile was a font id where that fonts was sugested but the "author" replied that only 2 or 3 persons had it and no way it was used. It's not Beta Sans also.

adriano, you're probably looking for the modified/customized version of Beta Sans that i made for inhouse use some years back. you can take a look at it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000809/http:/www.closefonts.com/11.html).

JesusType, how the hell did I remembered the 11.html.... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) Memory holes I tell you ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Thanks a lot Simon!!! And BTW great work, the font won't be available for sale I suppose?

joshua distler created a great font with Beta Sans, i just remixed it to my needs and for the fun of it. but thanks anyway.   
   
i doupt close Beta will ever be for sale but i plan on producing something with a similar feel sometime in the (hopefully) near future.
